name: Kélian
meta_description: Passionate, curious, autonomous, and self-taught software developer proficient in several languages. Explore my projects to get to know me better.
description: A passionate software developer since the age of 12, I have progressively acquired skills in various fields. Curious, autonomous, and self-taught, I master several languages and easily adapt to any type of environment. I continue to actively train in cybersecurity to constantly deepen and update my knowledge.

realprice.title: RealPrice

items.name: Web-ERP Malfunction Resolution
items.description: Analysis and resolution of a blocking incident in the communication module between the website and the ERP. Identification of an SSL certificate verification error in a PHP module and restoration of system services.
